text: Hey <@UL3VDLUSJ> sorry I didn’t see this last message until now.  The difference is that without a smart rule, if the person is a contact, there will be a Lead ID: with nothing after it.  With the smart rule it will show only the appropriate paragraph depending on if it’s a Lead or a Contact
Ok, thanks
Hello everyone, wondering if anyone else has experienced issues with HubSpot’s Site Preview links this morning?
What is the issue?

When trying to preview a page, I copy the Shareable preview link and paste it into a new tab. The links then redirect me to broken pages. I can DM you the link I copy and the link that it redirects me to when I hit enter
Sure can you DM me
So I need some assistance ASAP, i promoted a secondary domain to a primary and it just tanked a site
wait false alarm
looks like a small waiting
actually, now the menu is jacked up
ok that worked itself out, well that was scary lol
woah
to be a fly on a wall

Yea so note to all: When you are working with two brand name domains (root level ones) and you switch to one, then promote it to the be the primary for website over the other, HS needs about 2 - 3 mins to make that happen on the backend and do some housekeepin
so dont panic and just wait about 3 mins
ha
"dont panic"
that aint how i roll
Good to know!  We might be going through that exercise soon :grimacing:
Yea i was just in teh process of cleaning up the old domain and removing them from HS as we didnt need it but the primary was still assigned as the old domain of ours, so phew, back in business
I experienced an hour wait if you are moving another domain to HubSpot — however that was last fall.
